entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • mono minijit x64 test failure: loopinfinally_do.dll exception #68187
    7.0.0
  • RegexSourceGenerator informational diagnostics are not being displayed on VS text editor nor on the console #68182
    7.0.0
  • FDD app uses DOTNET_ROOT even though it points to wrong architecture #68180
  • SPMI benchmarks run should enable tiered compilation and pgo #68179
  • Infra improvements for Helix #68176
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'isValidGeneralDatasize(size)' during 'Generate code' #68170
  • Missing word in variable's documentation #68169
    7.0.0
  • BackgroundService will not observe exceptions thrown in ExecuteAsync #68165
  • Documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Options and HttpRequestMessage.Parameters #68164
  • The mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.11601 is missing from symbol servers. #68163
  • [tracking] Experimental WebAssembly multithreading support #68162
    7.0.0
  • Dereferencing a pointer to a byte-sized structure reads a DWORD #68157
    7.0.0
  • German text in setup help page is overlapped by program logo #68156
  • [API Proposal]: ISpanFormattable destination length #68154
  • [API Proposal]: `SuppressMessage`/`UnconditionalSuppressMessage` constructor without category #68153
  • Failed to download package DotNetHostPolicy when building in x86 during restore #68152
  • Missing documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Properties #68150
  • [API Proposal]: HttpRequestOptions should implement IReadOnlyDictionary #68149
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #68148
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer/fixer for converting Regex use to source generator #68147
    7.0.0

Closed

  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.11601 is missing from symbol servers #67446
  • WPF Trigger won't work #68175
  • [NativeAOT] Httpclient timeout #67537
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize not working for Guid property with protected setter #68155
  • Cannot get Total CPU Usage or Idle with System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses #66942
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'divMod->OperGet() != GT_UMOD' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #68174
  • Add multi-parameter overloads for Math.Max and Math.Min #24737
    Future
  • Consider implementing Ryu algorithm for double.ToString() #10939
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IUnaryReciprocalOperators<TSelf>` to `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>` #65939
  • Annotate Microsoft.Extensions.* assemblies for nullable reference types #43605
    7.0.0
  • No tests run in System.Linq.Expressions.Tests with Debug\Checked runtimes #68166
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.sh #66563
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #67046
    7.0.0
  • ILCompiler does not recognize "sha1" and "sha2" Instruction Sets #68132

PullRequests

Created

  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • avoid allocating collection for intermediate certificates #68188
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete AssemblySpec::m_wszCodeBase #68186
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fixing casing issue with TargetPath #68184
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Min/Max #68183
    area-System.Linq
  • Update perf map docs #68181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose ArrayMarshaller and PointerArrayMarshaller #68173
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve performance of test partitioning #68172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix a race condition in the thread pool #68171
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Rev TraceEventVersion to 2.0.77 #68167
    test-enhancement, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Overhaul when/where we check for Regex timeouts #68146
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Update dump template #68185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lift the restriction that we can have at most 4k regions #68168
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix compiled / source generated lazy loop stack handling #68138
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Expose APIs for getting the exponent and significand for IFloatingPoint types #68094
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update aka.ms link with NativeAOT optimization guide #68151
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update VSCode library debugging documentation #67925
    documentation
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • SPMI: fix AV in getStringLiteral #68161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd` #67513
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Exposing generic math support for unsigned right shift #68096
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Force tailcall nullchecks with LR #68107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable multiple nested "no GC" region requests #68105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices` #67512
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix handling of arm64 instruction sets in ilc #68142
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix pointer array marshalling #67988
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support generic math #68141
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • perf: Fix issues caused by a shared `dotnet` in helix correlation payload directory #67792
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • CheckValue is not a fast path for all callers #68125
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Correct MSVC version in requirements documentation #68078
    community-contribution
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Don't remove GT_NO_OP "non-removable" NOP #68114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono][jit] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4. #68098
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use "..."u8 in dotnet/runtime #67733
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #68119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
